main.name: Ozan Yurdakul
main.description: I eat, sleep and breath React/Next
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ozan! I've been coding for about 1 year now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with frontend and backend technologies and have worked out my favourites. Along the journey I realised my passion for coding is ðŸ”¥ and is not draining. With this passion, I have now created some nice to have projects. Through coding I became more self conscious and were able to organize more than just my daily code in life.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me! I dont want to miss meeting you!

education.description: Graduated with A-levels in english and chemistry
Graduated after 600+ hours fulltime & 3 months of coding experience

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
